Headline: #62 Archer Temporary Reroute near Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses temp. rerouted SB Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn; NB State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn: near Kinzie/Dearborn..

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Kinzie/Dearborn, due to street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Southbound buses will operate via Dearborn, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and Dearborn including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via State, Wacker, Clark, Hubbard and Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State , #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Kinzie/Dearborn
ShortDescription: 29 State , 36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State , #36 Broadway  buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Clark, Wacker and State: due to, street blockage near Kinzie/Dearborn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Delayed
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are delayed. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are delayed due to operator availability.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed Grand
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Racine due to a medical emergency on our tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between Damen and Racine due to a medical emergency on our tracks.

As a result, trains are operating in two sections:

between O'Hare and Damen, and,

between Racine and Forest Park, only.

At this time, consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines while we work to provide alternatives.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Damen to Racine to provide connecting  service in both directions.

See station personnel for further assistance and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for the latest service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
